title: iPhone users benefit as new report details widespread cellular data speed boost thanks to 5G
content:
As 5G spreads around the world, more people have access to faster, low-latency cellular data connections â€“ and that includes iPhone 12 and iPhone 13 users who benefit from the new technology. As reported by OpenSignal, average cellular data speeds have increased “almost everywhere” since the launch of 5G.
